name: NanoContextExtension
desc: Ergonomic extensions for BuildContext.

name: read
desc: Reads a dependency of type T from the nearest Scope.

name: use
desc: Alias for read. Often used in functional components.

name: NanoContextLogicExtension
desc: Extensions for functional logic access.

name: factory
desc: Creates a new instance of a dependency of type T using a factory.

name: logic
desc: Fast access to a NanoLogic registered in the Scope tree.

name: NanoDebugService
desc: Handles communication between the running app and DevTools.

name: dumpGraph
desc: Dumps the current dependency graph to the console.

name: getGraphData
desc: Returns the current dependency graph as a Map.

name: init
desc: Initializes the service extensions.

name: registerAtom
desc: Registers an Atom to be visible in DevTools.

name: registerDerivation
desc: Registers a NanoDerivation (Computed/Reaction) to be tracked.

name: registeredAtomCount
desc: Internal Returns the number of registered atoms. Used for testing.

name: registeredAtoms
desc: Internal Returns all registered atoms.

name: unregisterAtom
desc: Unregisters an Atom.

name: unregisterDerivation
desc: Unregisters a NanoDerivation.

name: FieldAtomReactiveExtension
desc: Extensions for FieldAtom to create reactive fields.

name: textField
desc: Returns a NanoTextField bound to this field.

name: NanoField
desc: A generic builder widget for any input that binds to a FieldAtom<T>.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: NanoTextField
desc: A specialized TextField that binds directly to a FieldAtom<String>.

name: createState
desc: Creates the mutable state for this widget at a given location in the tree.

name: onChange
desc: Called whenever an Atom or ComputedAtom changes its value.

name: onError
desc: Called whenever an error occurs (e.g., in AsyncAtom or NanoLogic.bindStream).

name: NanoLayout
desc: Configuration for NanoStack layout.

name: NanoLayout.all
desc: Shorthand constructor for uniform padding.

name: crossAxisAlignment
desc: Horizontal alignment of children.

name: mainAxisAlignment
desc: Vertical alignment of children.

name: padding
desc: Padding around the entire stack.

name: scrollable
desc: If true, wraps the column in a SingleChildScrollView.

name: spacing
desc: Gap to insert between every child.

name: NanoPage
desc: A standard screen layout that reduces Scaffold boilerplate.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: NanoStack
desc: A smart container that applies NanoLayout properties to its children.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: NanoAction
desc: Base class for all actions.

name: NanoList
desc: A List that automatically tracks reads and notifies on writes.

name: add
desc:
Adds value to the end of this list,
extending the length by one.

name: addAll
desc: Appends all objects of iterable to the end of this list.

name: clear
desc: Removes all objects from this list; the length of the list becomes zero.

name: insert
desc: Inserts element at position index in this list.

name: insertAll
desc: Inserts all objects of iterable at position index in this list.

name: length
desc: The number of objects in this list.

name: operator []
desc: The object at the given index in the list.

name: operator []=
desc: Sets the value at the given index in the list to value.

name: remove
desc: Removes the first occurrence of value from this list.

name: removeAt
desc: Removes the object at position index from this list.

name: removeLast
desc: Removes and returns the last object in this list.

name: removeWhere
desc: Removes all objects from this list that satisfy test.

name: retainWhere
desc: Removes all objects from this list that fail to satisfy test.

name: NanoMap
desc: A Map that automatically tracks reads and notifies on writes.

name: addAll
desc: Adds all key/value pairs of other to this map.

name: clear
desc: Removes all entries from the map.

name: keys
desc: The keys of this Map.

name: operator []
desc: The value for the given key, or null if key is not in the map.

name: operator []=
desc: Associates the key with the given value.

name: remove
desc: Removes key and its associated value, if present, from the map.

name: NanoSet
desc: A Set that automatically tracks reads and notifies on writes.

name: add
desc: Adds value to the set.

name: addAll
desc: Adds all elements to this set.

name: clear
desc: Removes all elements from the set.

name: contains
desc: Whether value is in the set.

name: iterator
desc: An iterator that iterates over the elements of this set.

name: length
desc: The number of elements in this Iterable.

name: lookup
desc: If an object equal to object is in the set, return it.

name: remove
desc: Removes value from the set.

name: removeAll
desc: Removes each element of elements from this set.

name: toSet
desc: Creates a Set with the same elements and behavior as this Set.

name: NanoComponent
desc: A convenience widget that combines a Scope and a reactive view.

name: build
desc: Describes the part of the user interface represented by this widget.

name: modules
desc: The list of dependencies to register for this component.

name: view
desc:
The reactive view of the component.
This method is automatically tracked (rebuilds when atoms change).

name: AsyncAtom
desc: An Atom that manages the state of an asynchronous operation.

name: AsyncData
desc: The state when the asynchronous operation has completed successfully.

name: debugFillProperties
desc: Add additional properties associated with the node.

name: AsyncError
desc: The state when the asynchronous operation has failed.

name: debugFillProperties
desc: Add additional properties associated with the node.

name: AsyncIdle
desc: The initial state before any operation has started.

name: AsyncLoading
desc: The state while the asynchronous operation is in progress.

name: debugFillProperties
desc: Add additional properties associated with the node.

name: AsyncState
desc: Represents the state of an asynchronous operation.

name: debugFillProperties
desc: Add additional properties associated with the node.

name: map
desc: Ergonomic mapping of async states.

name: Atom
desc:
The atomic unit of state.
Implements ValueListenable with extra powers:

name: Atom.internal
desc: Internal constructor for subclasses.

name: call
desc: Ergonomic shortcut to get/set the value.

name: debugFillProperties
desc: Add additional properties associated with the node.

name: dispose
desc:
Discards any resources used by the object. After this is called, the
object is not in a usable state and should be discarded (calls to
addListener will throw after the object is disposed).

name: select
desc:
Creates a derived ComputedAtom that selects a sub-field from this atom.
It only notifies when the selected value actually changes.

name: value
desc:
The current value of the object. When the value changes, the callbacks
registered with addListener will be invoked.

name: AtomBoolExtension
desc: Ergonomic extensions for Atom of type bool.

name: toggle
desc: Toggles the boolean value.

name: AtomFamily
desc: A factory for Atoms indexed by a key of type K.

name: call
desc:
Returns the atom associated with key.
Creates it using the factory if it doesn't already exist in the cache.

name: clear
desc: Clears all atoms from the cache.

name: keys
desc: Returns all currently cached keys.

name: remove
desc:
Removes the atom associated with key from the cache.
Note: This does not automatically dispose the atom if it's a ResourceAtom.

name: values
desc: Returns all currently cached atoms.

name: AtomIntExtension
desc: Ergonomic extensions for Atom of type int.

name: decrement
desc: Decrements the value by amount.

name: increment
desc: Increments the value by amount.

name: AtomListExtension
desc: Ergonomic extensions for Atom of type List.

name: add
desc: Adds element to the list.

name: addAll
desc: Adds all elements to the list.

name: clear
desc: Clears the list.

name: remove
desc: Removes element from the list.

name: AtomMapExtension
desc: Ergonomic extensions for Atom of type Map.

name: clear
desc: Clears the map.

name: put
desc: Adds key:val to the map.

name: putAll
desc: Adds all entries from other to the map.

name: remove
desc: Removes key from the map.

name: select
desc: Selects a specific part R of the state T.

name: AtomSetExtension
desc: Ergonomic extensions for Atom of type Set.

name: add
desc: Adds element to the set.

name: addAll
desc: Adds all elements to the set.

name: clear
desc: Clears the set.

name: remove
desc: Removes element from the set.

name: AtomTimeControlExtension
desc: Ergonomic extensions for time-based atom transformations.

name: debounce
desc: Returns a new Atom that debounces updates from this atom.

name: scan
desc: Returns a new Atom that accumulates state over time.

name: throttle
desc: Returns a new Atom that throttles updates from this atom.

name: CompositeObserver
desc: A composite observer that delegates to multiple observers.

name: addObserver
desc: Adds an observer to the list.

name: onChange
desc: Called whenever an Atom or ComputedAtom changes its value.

name: onError
desc: Called whenever an error occurs (e.g., in AsyncAtom or NanoLogic.bindStream).

name: removeObserver
desc: Removes an observer from the list.

name: ComputedAtom
desc: A read-only Atom that computes its value from other Atoms.

name: addListener
desc: Register a closure to be called when the object changes.

name: call
desc: Ergonomic shortcut to get/set the value.

name: dispose
desc:
Discards any resources used by the object. After this is called, the
object is not in a usable state and should be discarded (calls to
addListener will throw after the object is disposed).

name: removeListener
desc:
Remove a previously registered closure from the list of closures that are
notified when the object changes.

name: value
desc:
The current value of the object. When the value changes, the callbacks
registered with addListener will be invoked.

name: DebouncedAtom
desc: An Atom that automatically debounces its value.

name: dispose
desc:
Discards any resources used by the object. After this is called, the
object is not in a usable state and should be discarded (calls to
addListener will throw after the object is disposed).

name: DefaultObserver
desc: Default observer that prints to console in debug mode.

name: onChange
desc: Called whenever an Atom or ComputedAtom changes its value.

name: onError
desc: Called whenever an error occurs (e.g., in AsyncAtom or NanoLogic.bindStream).

name: Nano
desc: Global configuration for Nano.

name: action
desc:
Runs fn as an action.
Actions are used to batch state updates and provide a label for debugging.

name: backupState
desc:
Developer-Only Backups the current state of all registered atoms.
Used to simulate state persistence across Hot Restarts.

name: batch
desc: Batches notifications for state updates.

name: defaultObserver
desc:
Sets the global default observer.
Use this if you cannot rely on Scope zones (e.g. for simple apps or callbacks).

name: init
desc: Initialize Nano for debugging. Usually called by Scope.

name: initContext
desc: Internal Returns the current NanoInitContext.

name: isFlushing
desc: Internal Returns true if Nano is currently flushing a batch.

name: isFlushingAtom
desc: Internal Returns true if the given atom is currently in the flush queue.

name: isInAction
desc: Internal Returns true if an action is running.

name: middlewares
desc: Returns the list of active middlewares.

name: observer
desc: Returns the current NanoObserver.

name: reportRead
desc: Internal Reports an atom read to the current derivation.

name: reset
desc: Test Only Resets Nano global state for testing.

name: restoreState
desc: Developer-Only Restores the previously backed-up state.

name: storage
desc: Returns the current NanoStorage.

name: track
desc: Internal Runs fn inside a tracking context.

name: untracked
desc: Runs fn without tracking any dependencies.

name: version
desc: Internal Returns the current global version.

name: NanoDerivation
desc: Interface for anything that depends on Atoms (Computed, Reaction).

name: NanoInitContext
desc: Internal Context used to track the validity of the synchronous 'onInit' phase.

name: invalidate
desc: Invalidates this context, identifying the end of the synchronous phase.

name: NanoMiddleware
desc:
Interface for intercepting the lifecycle of an action.
Useful for analytics, performance profiling, and logging.

name: onActionEnd
desc: Called when an action ends.

name: onActionStart
desc: Called when an action starts.

name: NanoObjectExtension
desc: Ergonomic extensions for any object to create an Atom.

name: toAtom
desc: Converts any value to an Atom.

name: NanoObserver
desc:
Interface for intercepting state changes and errors.
Useful for logging to Console, Sentry, Crashlytics, etc.

name: onChange
desc: Called whenever an Atom or ComputedAtom changes its value.

name: onError
desc: Called whenever an error occurs (e.g., in AsyncAtom or NanoLogic.bindStream).

name: NanoSerializable
desc:
Interface for complex state that can be serialized/deserialized.
Required for robust DevTools time travel with complex models.

name: toJson
desc: Converts this object to a JSON-serializable map.

name: PersistAtom
desc: Alias for PersistedAtom for a more concise API.

name: PersistedAtom
desc: An Atom that persists its value to storage.

name: storage
desc:
The storage backend to use for this atom.
Falls back to Nano.storage if not provided.

name: ResourceAtom
desc: An Atom that manages the lifecycle of an external resource.

name: dispose
desc:
Discards any resources used by the object. After this is called, the
object is not in a usable state and should be discarded (calls to
addListener will throw after the object is disposed).

name: ResourceRef
desc: A handle for registering disposers within a ResourceAtom.

name: onDispose
desc: Registers a disposer that will be called when the ResourceAtom is disposed.

name: StreamAtom
desc: An Atom that manages the state of a Stream.

name: dispose
desc:
Discards any resources used by the object. After this is called, the
object is not in a usable state and should be discarded (calls to
addListener will throw after the object is disposed).

name: toStreamAtom
desc: Converts a Stream into a StreamAtom.

name: ThrottledAtom
desc: An Atom that automatically throttles its value.

name: dispose
desc:
Discards any resources used by the object. After this is called, the
object is not in a usable state and should be discarded (calls to
addListener will throw after the object is disposed).

name: ValueAtom
desc: A concrete Atom that holds a mutable value.

name: dispose
desc:
Discards any resources used by the object. After this is called, the
object is not in a usable state and should be discarded (calls to
addListener will throw after the object is disposed).

name: value
desc:
The current value of the object. When the value changes, the callbacks
registered with addListener will be invoked.

name: ValueListenableStreamExtension
desc: Extension to convert a ValueListenable into a Stream.

name: stream
desc: Returns a Stream that emits the current value and subsequent updates.

name: WorkerAtom
desc: An Atom that performs heavy computations in a background isolate.

name: dispose
desc:
Discards any resources used by the object. After this is called, the
object is not in a usable state and should be discarded (calls to
addListener will throw after the object is disposed).

name: computed
desc: Creates a ComputedAtom that automatically tracks all Atoms accessed within selector.

name: NanoException
desc: Specialized exception for Nano-related errors.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: NanoFactory
desc: Wrapper for Factory registration (new instance every time).

name: NanoLazy
desc: Wrapper for Lazy Singleton registration (created on first read).

name: Registry
desc: A simple registry to hold your dependencies.

name: clear
desc: Removes all local registrations.

name: debugFillProperties
desc: Add additional properties associated with the node.

name: dispose
desc: Disposes all registered services that implement ChangeNotifier.

name: get
desc: Retrieves the registered instance of type T.

name: register
desc: Registers an instance of type T.

name: registerFactory
desc: Registers a factory that creates a new instance of T every time.

name: registerFactoryDynamic
desc: Registers a factory with explicit type.

name: registerLazySingleton
desc: Registers a lazy singleton that is created on first read.

name: registerLazySingletonDynamic
desc: Registers a lazy singleton with explicit type.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: nano_flutter
desc: Nano Flutter

name: FieldAtom
desc: An Atom that manages form field state including validation.

name: error
desc:
The current error message, if any.
Returns null if valid or not yet validated.

name: errorAtom
desc: The error atom for tracking in UI.

name: isValid
desc: Whether the field is currently valid.

name: reset
desc: Resets the field to initial state and clears errors.

name: validate
desc:
Runs all validators and updates error.
Returns true if valid.

name: FormAtom
desc: Aggregates multiple FieldAtoms.

name: isValid
desc: Whether the whole form is valid.

name: isValidAtom
desc: An atom that tracks the validity of the whole form.

name: reset
desc: Resets all fields.

name: validate
desc: Validates all fields immediately.

name: Validators
desc: A library of common validators.

name: NanoLogic
desc: Base class for your Business Logic (ViewModel).

name: auto
desc:
Runs effect immediately and whenever any Atom accessed within it changes.
The reaction is automatically disposed when this NanoLogic is disposed.

name: bind
desc:
Helper to bind a Listenable (e.g., ValueNotifier, TextEditingController)
to an action or effect.

name: bindStream
desc: Helper to bind a Stream (e.g., from Drift or Firebase) to an Atom.

name: dispatch
desc: Dispatches an NanoAction to the logic.

name: dispose
desc:
Discards any resources used by the object. After this is called, the
object is not in a usable state and should be discarded (calls to
addListener will throw after the object is disposed).

name: error
desc: Holds the error object if status is NanoStatus.error.

name: initialize
desc: Internal method to ensure onInit and onReady are called correctly.

name: onAction
desc: Called when an NanoAction is dispatched from the UI.

name: onInit
desc:
Called immediately after the Logic is created.
Use this for field initialization and dependency setup.

name: onReady
desc:
Called after onInit in a microtask.
Use this for side-effects (state updates, navigation, etc).

name: react
desc:
Runs sideEffect whenever the value returned by tracker changes.
The reaction is automatically disposed when this NanoLogic is disposed.

name: status
desc: The current status of the logic (loading, success, error, empty).

name: NanoStatus
desc: Possible states for a NanoLogic.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: AtomTestExtension
desc: extension to make testing Atoms easier with standard Matchers.

name: stream
desc:
Returns a Stream of values emitted by this Atom.
Useful for usage with expectLater and emitsInOrder.

name: tester
desc: Creates a NanoTester to capture and verify emissions from this Atom.

name: NanoTester
desc: A utility to capture and verify emissions from an Atom.

name: clear
desc: Clears the captured emissions.

name: dispose
desc: Cancels the internal subscription.

name: emissions
desc: The list of values emitted by the atom since this tester was created.

name: expect
desc: Waits for pending microtasks and verifies that emissions match matcher.

name: atomToStream
desc: Waits for atom to emit values matching matchers in order.

name: TimelineMiddleware
desc: A middleware that record Nano actions in the Flutter DevTools Timeline.

name: onActionEnd
desc: Called when an action ends.

name: onActionStart
desc: Called when an action starts.

name: InMemoryStorage
desc: A simple in-memory storage implementation (default).

name: read

name: write
desc: Writes a value to storage.

name: NanoStorage
desc: Interface for storage backend.

name: delete
desc: Deletes a value from storage.

name: read
desc: Reads a value from storage.

name: write

A storage implementation that uses SharedPreferences.
This requires the shared_preferences package to be available in the project.

name: delete
desc: Deletes a value from storage.

name: read
desc: Reads a value from storage.

name: write
desc: Writes a value to storage.

name: ReactionDisposer
desc: Disposes a reaction.

name: autorun
desc: Runs effect immediately and whenever any Atom accessed within it changes.

name: reaction
desc: Runs sideEffect whenever the value returned by tracker changes.

name: atomTest
desc: A declarative test helper for Atoms.

name: nanoTest

Called when this object is reinserted into the tree after having been

Called whenever the application is reassembled during debugging, for
